subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit 4.x and support for Java 1.4
msgSnippet: ... I m not quite sure what you mean by tightly , but we do have an Eclipse plug-in that works exactly like JUnit s (with added features for groups and other
messageBody:
On 9/14/06, Mark Levison <mlevison@...> wrote:
>
>
> Because TestNG isn't tightly integrated into Eclipse


I'm not quite sure what you mean by "tightly", but we do have an Eclipse
plug-in that works exactly like JUnit's (with added features for groups and
other TestNG-specific things). We also have plug-ins for IntelliJ and
NetBeans (and JDeveloper soon).

--
Cédric
